performers.quickbio: Inspiring urban youth and sub-urban wanabees alike, NWA was and is the archetype of Gangsta Rap.

albums.title: Straight Outta Compton

albums.imageinfo: N.W.A in 1989. Clockwise from bottom left: Ice Cube, DJ Yella, Dr. Dre., MC Ren, and Eazy E. (Douglas R. Burrows / For The Times )

performers.quickbio: Dreams of fleeing the trailer-park and crazy lyrical stylings brought Eminem out of the shadows as a true leader of America's youth.

albums.imageinfo: The Real Slim Shady Cover Shows Eminem Holding a Skateboard Standing on Stairs.

performers.quickbio: Truly an inspiration to millions of teenage girls and Kim Jong-un alike!
